TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SelectionMode extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: This enumeration is used by to decide how selection behaves.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.SelectionMode Browse = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Only one item can be selected at any given moment. Any item currently having focus will be marked as selected.

remarks.para: Only one item can be selected at any given moment. Any item currently having focus will be marked as selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.SelectionMode Multiple = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Several items may be selected or unselected with a click or using the spacebar. The selection can be done using the Ctrl and Shift modifier keys in the usual way.

remarks.para: Note that multiple selection should only be used where all items share the exact same callback routine.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.SelectionMode None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Gtk.SelectionMode Single = int32(1)
